Save on your medications today! MailHealthCare Helps You Save with Prescription. Drug prices vary significantly by pharmacy location. Prices can even vary between pharmacies directly across the street from each other. MailHealthCare helps you find needed drugs at pharmacies in the world, so you can save up to 85% on prescriptions.

Returns

Per pharmacy regulations, we cannot accept prescriptions for return or refund once they have shipped.

Please inspect all orders upon receipt. If there are any discrepancies with your order, you must notify ProFarmaExpress within 24 hours.

If you have any issues with your order, shipment, or medication, you must call the ProFarmaExpress team at:

(855) 770-1077within 24-hours
